accounts.name: player_account
docs: We verify it's owned by our program in the instruction handler

instructions.name: steal_property_instant
docs: Instant steal with cooldown protection (SINGLE TRANSACTION - 33% success rate)
Randomly selects target from eligible owners passed in remaining_accounts

errors.name: NoSlotsAvailable
errors.msg: No available slots for this property

errors.name: CooldownActive
errors.msg: Cooldown still active - cannot purchase yet

errors.name: DoesNotOwnProperty
errors.msg: Player does not own this property

errors.name: InvalidShieldSlots
errors.msg: Invalid number of slots to shield

errors.name: TargetDoesNotOwnProperty
errors.msg: Target does not own this property

errors.name: AllSlotsProtected
errors.msg: All slots are protected (shielded or steal protection active)

errors.name: Unauthorized
errors.msg: Unauthorized - ownership does not match player

errors.name: PropertyMismatch
errors.msg: Property mismatch between ownership and property account

errors.name: TooManyProperties
errors.msg: Too many properties in single claim (max 22)

errors.name: ClaimTooSoon
errors.msg: Claim too soon - wait at least 1 minutes

errors.name: VrfNotReady
errors.msg: VRF result not ready yet - wait at least 1 slot

errors.name: PendingStealExists
errors.msg: Pending steal request exists - wait 5 minutes or until fulfilled

errors.name: NotFulfilled
errors.msg: Steal request not fulfilled yet - cannot close

errors.name: StealRequestExpired
errors.msg: Steal request expired - must fulfill within 150 slots (~60 sec)

errors.name: StealCooldownActive
errors.msg: Steal cooldown active - wait before attempting again

errors.name: InvalidShieldDuration
errors.msg: Invalid shield duration. Must be between 1 and 48 hours.

errors.name: ShieldAlreadyActive
errors.msg: Shield is already active. Wait for expiry before reactivating.

errors.name: StealProtectionActive
errors.msg: Steal protection is active on this property
